3. The European Union (National Emission Ceilings) Regulations 2018 

(S.I. No. 232 of 2018) are amended as follows– 

(a) 

In Regulation 3(1), by substituting for the definition of 
“Minister” the following: 

“Minister” means Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications,”,

(1) Re-submissions due to errors shall be provided within four weeks and 
include a clear explanation of the changes made. 

(C) In Schedule 4, Part 2 (‘National emission projections’), point 2, is replaced 
by the following: 

‘2. Projections of emissions shall be estimated and reported by NFR source 
category. Where not possible due to lack of sufficiently detailed data, a 
justification for reporting at a more aggregated level shall be included in the 
Informative Inventory Report. Member States shall provide a “with measures” 
(adopted measures) projection and, where relevant, a “with additional 
measures” (planned measures) projection for each pollutant in accordance with 
the guidance established in the EMEP/EEA Guidebook.’. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and
